Detailed Description

Provides a class for showing progress with dots written to an output stream.

void DotProgress::SetStepProperties ( int  level,
int  mx,
int  inc 
) [virtual]

Sets the upper limit of the range of the progress display.

Parameters:
level - level of verbosity desired.
mx The maximum number of steps in the task.
inc The number of steps performed before the progress display is updated.
